channel.title: Apparix
channel.description: Authentic Irish Aran sweaters, Scottish Harris Tweed, Celtic jewelry, and unique handmade gifts.

item.g:title: Pure New Irish Merino Wool Throw Blanket - Made in Ireland
item.g:description: This Pure New Merino Wool Throw is crafted in Ireland from 100% premium Merino wool by SAOL Knitwear. Designed for exceptional warmth, softness, and durability, this throw features a refined woven texture that reflects traditional Irish craftsmanship. Naturally breathable and insulating, it is ideal for year-round comfort on sofas, chairs, or beds.
item.g:google_product_category: Home & Garden > Linens & Bedding > Bedding > Blankets & Throws

item.g:title: Harris Tweed Large Ladies Tote Bag by Glen Appin - Authentic Scottish Wool
item.g:description: This elegant Harris Tweed tote from Glen Appin of Scotland blends classic craftsmanship with everyday functionality. Made from 100% genuine Harris Tweed, handwoven in the Outer Hebrides using time-honored methods. The fabric offers exceptional depth of color, durability, and a timeless Scottish aesthetic. Includes fixed shoulder straps and a removable long strap for crossbody wear.
item.g:google_product_category: Apparel & Accessories > Handbags, Wallets & Cases > Handbags > Tote Bags

item.g:title: Classic Irish Merino Wool Cable Knit Coat - Made in Ireland
item.g:description: Stay warm and stylish all winter with this Classic Aran Cable Merino Wool Coat for women. Crafted from 100% sumptuous merino wool, this longer-length knit coat features rich Aran textures, including basket, vertical rope and braided cable stitch patterns. Designed with a layered asymmetrical flap collar and modern four-button side fastening.
item.g:google_product_category: Apparel & Accessories > Clothing > Outerwear > Coats & Jackets

item.g:title: Aran Knit Tree of Life Wool Coat - Women's Merino Wool Cable Knit Coat
item.g:description: Elevate your cold-weather wardrobe with this Aran Knit Tree of Life Wool Coat, a timeless and cozy outerwear piece featuring classic cable knit texture and a symbolic Tree of Life pattern. Crafted from high-quality merino wool, this coat combines warmth, structure, and sophisticated style. Perfect for everyday wear or special outings during crisp weather.
item.g:google_product_category: Apparel & Accessories > Clothing > Outerwear > Coats & Jackets
